description: Complete system overview focusing on the sports league management platform architecture, key components, and high-level workflows
Detailed documentation of the multi-step onboarding workflow, state transitions, and conditional routing based on user roles
Comprehensive documentation of the role-based access system, permissions structure, and feature sets for players vs captains
Documentation of team creation, joining, and invitation processes including validation rules and membership management
Documentation of player rating calculations, standings computations, achievement systems, and sport-specific scoring rules
